meanings.definition: A style that is contrary or opposite to another style.
meanings.sent1: The artist's use of counterstyles in the painting created a bold contrast.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer combined different counterstyles to achieve a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer's decision to mix vintage and modern counterstyles was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, sometimes the clash of counterstyles can lead to innovative creations.
meanings.sent5: The clash of counterstyles in the room made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To create a design or pattern that contrasts with another design or pattern.
meanings.sent1: She decided to counterstyles her outfit by pairing a floral top with striped pants.
meanings.sent2: The artist counterstyles the background to make the main subject stand out.
meanings.sent3: He always counterstyles his music playlists to keep things interesting.
meanings.sent4: The chef likes to counterstyles flavors to surprise his customers.
meanings.sent5: Counterstyling the room with bold colors made it pop.
